body.name: Iron Supplement High Potency Liquid Iron for Adults by Hematex - 100mg Polysaccharide Iron Complex Iron Supplements for Anemia and Iron Deficiency (Chocolate Caramel Flavor)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 20% on your first Subscribe and Save order.

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 7 mins
features: Liquid Iron Polysaccharide - Polysaccharide iron complex is readily absorbable, therefore it minimizes the side effects of stomach pain, irritation, and constipation that are normally caused by other forms of iron.

High Dose Iron - Hematex Liquid Iron Polysaccharide provides 100mg of polysaccharide iron complex for those who need it the most. It is a clinical high dose that has been shown to be more effective than other doses of iron.

Safe for Kids & Adults - Hematex is safe for kids and adults and it works to beat iron deficiency while still being gentle on the stomach. As a liquid iron supplement, it’s easy to take and requires no pill cutting or no bulky capsules.

Supports Energy Levels due to Iron Deficiency - Anemia occurs when your body doesn’t produce enough red blood cells or hemoglobin. The polysaccharide iron complex helps to improve energy levels and reduce fatigue.

Made in USA - When you buy Hematex you can rest assured that you’re getting exactly what you pay for. Our products are made in the USA in a facility that regularly undergoes extensive and strict quality control audits.
Great Flavor - Chocolate caramel flavor makes taking iron a pleasant experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My iron levels are always dropping. So I have to keep them boosted constantly or I get chronic fatigue. I have purchase this product a lot. I hate swallowing pills and is easy to take and tastes great for an iron supplement. I think the only bad thing about it, is it stains if you spill it. So be sure to clean it quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. My doctor recommended iron as I was very low and newly anemic. I did plenty of research and settled on a liquid option. I continued to read and research products and landed on Llorens. All of the positive reviews helped. The taste is bearable/pleasant with a little metallic aftertaste, to be expected. I have been taking it for 3 days now and today, I didn't feel like I needed to take a nap. Looking forward to seeing how it helps going forward and what my labs reveals in a few weeks.Edit: take with food! I didn't on day 1, and was nauseous and felt terrible. Now I take with an uncrustable and juice with vitamin c.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not at all like raspberry flavor, but …
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I’ve tried a liquid iron supplement.I like the high dosage which makes it easy for me to fulfill my daily need with one easy swallow instead of having to fight down 3-4 large tablets.And I hope that this liquid formula will be easier on my stomach and not cause constipation like my other iron tablets have.As of the taste, it sure isn’t even close to resemble raspberry but since it doesn’t leave too much of an aftertaste, I don’t mind it too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Decided to take a chance on this iron because I’m currently having issues with pcos, heavy bleeding, low iron, vitamin d, b12.After an IV iron infusion my doctor gave the advice of keeping my levels up by taking a supplement so here I am. It’s my first day of taking this particular brand but my hope is that I see improvement in my symptoms soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I’m not as tired as before. The taste is not the greatest. But it’s loaded with iron can’t expect much on the taste. But it has improved my energy levels so my workouts have been getting longer in duration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I normally don’t write reviews but this definitely deserves it.The taste is actually not that bad, definitely tolerable! I’ve had no issues with it & would recommend it to anyone needing a high iron supplement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can notice a difference!
reviews.reviewText: I love how much more energy I have since I started using this product! I have put some in my smoothie every morning for the last 35 days and intend to continue as long as needed, as i just received my second bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is some strong stuff.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using LLorens (raspberry) for over 3 weeks. Odd taste. Not much of a taste actually. I take it straight. No unpleasant after-taste. I had been taking Ceregumil for several months and saw great results (it's no longer available on Amazon). LLorens is definitely stronger. I can't take it every day due to constipation (even while increasing fiber and taking a lower dosage). I take it a couple times a week. Not sure yet what effect it will have on my iron levels because they annual physical is a couple of months out.
